Package org.apache.mahout.ga.watchmaker

Class Summary
EvalMapper Generic Mapper class for fitness evaluation.
MahoutEvaluator Generic Mahout distributed evaluator.
MahoutFitnessEvaluator<T> Watchmaker compatible Fitness Evaluator that delegates the evaluation of the whole population to Mahout.
OutputUtils Utility Class that deals with the output.
STEvolutionEngine<T> Single Threaded Evolution Engine.
STFitnessEvaluator<T> Special Fitness Evaluator that evaluates all the population ones.
